original_text: Tekel means “weighed”. It shows that God has weighed you. But the scales show that you are too light.
korean_text: 데겔은 왕을 저울에 달아 보니 부족함이 보였다 함이요

sentences.original_text: It shows that God has weighed you
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 하나님이 당신을 저울질했다는 것을 보여줍니다

sentences.original_text: But the scales show that you are too light
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 저울은 당신이 너무 가볍다는 것을 보여줍니다
